headline.main: Aid for Russia Advocated; We Are Urged to Send Materiel to the Eastern Theatre of War

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: In your editorial of Sept. 20 you have endorsed the too-little, too-late policy of sending the bulk of lease-lend supplies to England and some leftover help to Russia "for special needs." But --
abstract: lr on importance of campaign in Hitler ultimate defeat
